ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request: Json editor in fullscreen
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey, I was checking this awesome app in my docker environment, and it's just impressive :relaxed: I'm not sure if there is already some feature like this: I would like to edit long text and JSON text in full screen or some pop-up. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29312172/134696184-e714f8ac-1e2c-47dd-bc66-567fc8a42d1a.png) Right now the `monaco` editing experience is somehow ruined by the cringing editor dimensions :flushed: I suggest to add the expand icon somewhere near to these fields: In the table view: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29312172/134697367-9dfce9dc-4fda-4f31-915c-75da7626e0c4.png) and in the detail view as well: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29312172/134697500-4fa3d4a5-23a4-4fe8-8a89-84ae24f030e6.png) Thanks upfront
